descriptions: Student does not identify any internal factors influencing mental, emotional, and social health.
Student identifies one internal factor with limited accuracy or detail.
Student identifies two internal factors with some accuracy and basic details.
Student identifies three internal factors with reasonable accuracy and details.
Student identifies four internal factors with good accuracy and clear details.
Student comprehensively identifies multiple internal factors with excellent accuracy, providing thorough details and demonstrating a strong understanding of their impact.
Student does not identify any external factors influencing mental, emotional, and social health.
Student identifies one external factor with limited accuracy or detail.
Student identifies two external factors with some accuracy and basic details.
Student identifies three external factors with reasonable accuracy and details.
Student identifies four external factors with good accuracy and clear details.
Student comprehensively identifies multiple external factors with excellent accuracy, providing thorough details and demonstrating a strong understanding of their impact.
Student demonstrates no understanding of how internal and external factors influence mental, emotional, and social health.
Student shows a minimal understanding of how one internal or external factor influences health.
Student demonstrates a basic understanding of how several internal and external factors influence health, but lacks depth.
Student demonstrates a reasonable understanding of how multiple internal and external factors influence health with some specific examples.
Student demonstrates a good understanding of how internal and external factors influence various aspects of health, providing clear and relevant examples.

Student demonstrates a comprehensive and nuanced understanding of how internal and external factors interact to influence mental, emotional, and social health, providing insightful examples and demonstrating critical thinking.
